tool.name: MLFlow Train
tool.command: mkdir model && export MLFLOW_LOGGING_LEVEL=ERROR && pixi run --as-is --manifest-path /src python -m ml_poc --url $url --experiment $experiment train #if $register_model_name !="": --register-model-name $register_model_name #end if #if $save_model !="": --save-model-path model #end if --optimize-params $optimize_params > >(tee -a $output) 2> >(tee -a $output >&2)

param.name: register_model_name
param.label: Name to register model in MLFlow

tool.help:
**ML POC**
This is a Galaxy tool that generates an ML model for wine quality and pushes it to MlFlow.
For more information, see the repository: https://code.ornl.gov/ndip/tool-sources/generic/ml-test
